I'm also in need of a highly-rated hotel in Paris that fits the budget (assuming two meals) based on its minimum price. Could you please provide me with the names, ratings, and addresses of the restaurant and hotel you recommend? Thank you so much!

<function_thought>
To fulfill the user's request for a restaurant and hotel recommendation in Paris, I'll start by getting a list of all restaurants in the city. This will allow me to find options that serve authentic French cuisine and to subsequently retrieve information on their ratings and reviews. Simultaneously, I will also look for hotels in Paris to proceed with finding one within the user's budget. This approach aligns with the user's need for a restaurant and a hotel recommendation. 
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_all_restaurants_in_city(city="Paris"), get_all_hotels_in_city(city="Paris")]</function_call>
